snippet.title: Pac-Man Escape - Game Boy Hack Gameplay
snippet.description:
You certainly didn't expect to see a hack for this particular GB game, now did you?

Developed by thirtythree, this is a complete reworking of the Game Boy Lock n' Chase into a very fun Pac-Man game called “Pac-Man Escape“. Can Pac-Man rescue Ms. Pac-Man from the evil ghosts in the world's first hack of the Game Boy Lock n' Chase?

All of the graphics have received a nice Pac-Man style facelift. Including the 4 different types of ghost.

The 2 doors at your disposal on each maze now stay permanently shut. (They only lasted a few seconds in the original Lock ‘N Chase.) This adds more strategy to the gameplay. If you trap a ghost inside of these 2 doors you will recieve bonus points. Which also makes the rest of that maze easier. But be sure to not trap yourself… you will have to restart if you do!

Pac-Man (C) Bandai Namco
Ms. Pac-Man (C) AtGames...?
Lock n' Chase (C) G-Mode Corporation
Download: https://www.romhacking.net/hacks/8055/

#retrogames #retrogaming #dataeast #locknchase #gameboy #gb #gameboygames #pacman #mspacman #pac_man #gbhack #gameboyhack #romhacking #romhack #romhacks
